plot: Ray Bennett, a lonely video-store owner in the middle of nowhere decides to take some days off his work to think about his future. On the road, he comes across Harley, a very attractive, mysterious woman and ex-prisoner. Having been lonely for some time, he seems charmed and willing to spend some time with her, while she needs a man to help her finish a pretty well-paying job, left in the middle when she was busted for drug money distribution. Intentions differ, plans change and &"trust&" is a dangerous word as they make their way into the local cartel boss's business, with $2 million and maybe a new life as a compass.   Written by  Aristoteles &"IronBruce&" Kostoulas
title: Backflash
